snippet: A player went into convulsions after a fight in a junior league game in Iowa. Last week, concussion researchers urged a ban on fighting in junior and professional hockey.
abstract: Skip Prince, commissioner of the United States Hockey League, will review rules governing fights after 18-year-old defenseman Dylan Chanter had a seizure and was hospitalized following fight; concussion researchers at the Mayo Clinic are calling for full ban on fighting in junior and professional hockey, partly because of severe injuries that can be sustained in hockey fights.
lead_paragraph: A player went into convulsions after a fight in a junior league game in Iowa. Last week, concussion researchers urged a ban on fighting in junior and professional hockey.

headline.main: Prompted by Injury, a League Will Review Rules on Fighting
headline.print_headline: Prompted by Injury, a League Will Review Rules on Fighting
